name: Andre Iguodala
quote: I want to dominate a little more, just to be a level beyond everyone else. I expect that from myself.

name: Damian Jones
quote: "I try to look at the positives. Being depressed is not going to get me anywhere." (Referring to his long rehab.)

name: DeMarcus Cousins
quote: "I'm stubborn, and I love that about myself. I never quit. I'm a fighter. I feel like I can overcome anything, and I continue to have that mindset." (Referring to overcoming his injury.)

name: Draymond Green
quote: "All hell about to break loose, so it's gonna be fun." (Referring to DeMarcus Cousins returning from his injury.)

name: Jonas Jerebko
quote: "It was fun." (Referring to his role in defeating the Utah Jazz who had just waived him.)

name: Jordan Bell
quote: "I'm keeping track of how many people have scored on me."

name: Kevin Durant
quote: "People hate the fact that I play for the Warriors, and people hate the fact that I'm so damn good at basketball."

name: Kevon Looney
quote: "...when they offered me a contract, I knew I wanted to come back, to try to do it all over again." (After he re-signed for the 2018-2019 season.)

name: Klay Thompson
quote: "The internet is a very volatile place. I don't try to be on there too much." (Referring to reactions to previous interview questions.)

name: Quinn Cook
quote: "I have so much energy! ...everything is just perfect." (Reflecting on the 2018 championship win.)

name: Shaun Livingston
quote: "Awesome... dope... accurate" (Referring to the newest Shaun Livingston bobblehead.)

name: Stephen Curry
quote: "Be the best version of yourself in anything you do. You don't have to live anybody else's story."
